name: Escapee
description:
This third person dungeon crawler places the player in control of Jimmy the budding explorer throughout his adventures exploring long lost dungeons. As he moves through the level he encounters various items and enemies that both help and hinder him. 

The game takes place in a procedurally generated dungeon world, surrounded by enemies and unknowns. The game's world is populated by Jimmy, and two different enemy types, skeletons and zombies. Both different enemy types have different characteristics and require differing techniques to defeat. 

Controls:

(PS4 layout) 

 Left Analogue - Movement 

 Right Analogue - Look (possible feature) 

 X - Jump

  Triangle - Interact 

 Square - Swing

  Circle - Block

  L3 - Crouch
